original_text: But if you do not obey the Lord, and if you rebel against his commands, his hand will be against you, as it was against your ancestors.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 여호와의 목소리를 듣지 아니하고 여호와의 명령을 거역하면 여호와의 손이 너희의 조상들을 치신 것 같이 너희를 치실 것이라

sentences.original_text: But if you do not obey the Lord,
and if you rebel against his commands,
his hand will be against you,
as it was against your ancestors.
